channel.description: Recent content in üè¢ School of Artificial Intelligence, University of Chinese Academy of Sciences on AI Paper Reviews by AI

item.title: RAG-RewardBench: Benchmarking Reward Models in Retrieval Augmented Generation for Preference Alignment
item.description: First benchmark for RAG reward models reveals their limitations and the need for preference-aligned training.

item.title: DEMO: Reframing Dialogue Interaction with Fine-grained Element Modeling
item.description: DEMO benchmark revolutionizes dialogue modeling by focusing on fine-grained elements (Prelude, Interlocution, Epilogue), enabling comprehensive evaluation and superior agent performance.
